recipe.title: Easy Homemade Rice and Beans
recipe.instructions: Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add onions and saute until soft, or for about 5 minutes. Add all other remaining ingredients and stir together. Increase the heat to medium high and bring to a boil. Cover and reduce heat to medium low so that the mixture simmers. Cook for 15-20 minutes, or until rice is fluffy and liquid is absorbed.* Serve with salsa, cheese, and sour cream.
recipe.summary: Easy Homemade Rice and Beans is a main course that serves 2. One serving contains 446 calories, 19g of protein, and 4g of fat. For $1.06 per serving, this recipe covers 26% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals.
